definition-item.definition-title: PLANTING; SOWING; FERTILISING (parts, details or accessories of agricultural machines or implements, in general A01B51/00 - A01B75/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Parts, details or accessories of agricultural machines or implements, in general

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Combined with general working of soil
Horticulture and cultivation in controlled environments or containers
Apparatus for spreading sand or salt

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Any of a kingdom (Plantae) of multicellular eukaryotic mostly photosynthetic organisms typically lacking locomotive movement or obvious nervous or sensory organs and possessing cellulose cell walls.
Placement of seed, bulbs or plants into the ground for growth.
Placement of seed into or onto the ground for growth.
Application of fertiliser into or onto the ground near seed, bulb or plants to stimulate growth.

definition-item.definition-title: Apparatus, or methods of use thereof, for testing or treating seed, roots, or the like, prior to sowing or planting

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
General methods and apparatuses for treating seeds, involving mechanical means.
Aspects relating directly to chemical treatments or chemical formulations are classified in the appropriate chemical groups.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Chemicals for testing or treating seed, roots
Sampling of (parts of) seeds for testing

definition-item.definition-title: Germinating apparatus; Determining germination capacity of seeds or the like

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Testing seeds for determining their viability or germination capacity}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Testing, but not obtaining samples for testing, whereby the testing for viability is non-destructive.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Sampling of (parts of) seeds for testing

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:
No chemical compositions or formulas classified in this group. Only the composition in respect of disposition of layers and similar, or materials used.
This place covers:
Mechanical means/machines, e.g. nozzles, used for coating seeds or mechanical aspects of the coating.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

A01C1/08 relates to mechanical aspects, such as machines or mechanical means for immunising, using electricity, magnetism, temperature treatments, etc., or the mechanical means for administering a chemical composition. No chemical formulas or compositions are classified in this group.
This place covers:
General methods for treating manure for its specific use as an agricultural input.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Ploughs with additional arrangements for putting manure under the soil
Treating of waste water, sewage or sludge
Organic fertilisers from waste or refuse

definition-item.definition-title: Storage places for manure, e.g. cisterns for liquid manure; Installations for fermenting manure

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Bioreactors and fermenters with heat exchange systems

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Bioreactors and fermenters with mixing means

definition-item.definition-title: {Covers, roofs or other structures for covering manure storage places}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Bioreactors and fermenters with production of methane or biogas
Coverings for swimming or splash baths or pools

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Making or covering furrows or holes for sowing, planting or manuring (ploughs for making ridges A01B13/02)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Agricultural soil working not specifically for these purposes

definition-item.definition-title: Hand tools for making holes for sowing, planting or manuring

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for laying-out or removing protective coverings for plants

definition-item.definition-title: Machines for making or covering drills or furrows for sowing or planting

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

All aspects not covered in subgroups of A01C5/06 are classified here. A single document can have a group symbol in more than one of the subgroups, if the respective relevant information is covered by them.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangement for driving working parts of seeders

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Tool or combinations of tools minimum till sowing techniques.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Combination of soil working tools for planting

section-body.paragraph-text: Specific details about the soil cutting or furrowing tools are additionally classified in the corresponding group under the subclass A01B.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Single-grain seeders with or without suction devices

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Seeders for planting single seeds at equal intervals typically in laterally spaced rows.
Suction is created by pneumatic means.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for adjusting the seed-box; Regulation of machines for depositing quantities at intervals
Machines for depositing quantities of seed at intervals

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Seed singulators operated under pressure of gas or air.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Aspects of pneumatic seeders not related to the singulating of seeds

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Devices for knocking multiples of seeds from an aperture back into the seed pool such that a single seed remains in the aperture for immediate sowing.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.
Singulator = 44
This place covers:
Devices for ejecting seeds from apertures for immediate sowing. This place also includes ejectors for forcefully ejecting seed or debris stuck in apertures.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.
Ejector = 1
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Apparatus for two kinds of fertiliser

section-body.paragraph-text: General aspects are classified here. This group symbol must always be combined with the relevant group symbol for the particular invention (distributing system, furrowing tools, regulation, etc.)

definition-item.definition-title: {Seeders depositing seeds in rows using pneumatic means}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Particular aspects of seed singulating systems using pneumatic means
Specific aspects for fertilizer distribution, i.e. distribution of powder fertilisants

definition-item.definition-title: {Ducts, distribution pipes or details thereof for pneumatic seeders}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
In this group also the relevant aspects of distribution of granular fertilizer using pneumatic means are classified.
This place covers:
Sensors for counting or detecting the passage of seeds.

definition-item.definition-title: Seeders with other distributing devices, e.g. brushes, discs, screws or slides

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Fertilisers with adjustable shutters or slits

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Seeders in which the seeds are downwardly driven only by gravity to the ground.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.
Deflectors = 70
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Machines for depositing quantities of seed at intervals

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Parts of seeders for conducting and depositing seed

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
This place covers:
Means for adjusting or maintaining a uniform pressure, even if they have an effect on the depth regulation.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Chassis; Coupling means to a tractor or the like; Lifting means; Side markers}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
This place covers:
Planting of all types of tubers, bulbs and similar big, round shaped reproductive material.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Potato planters with other distributing devices

definition-item.definition-title: with other distributing devices, e.g. flaps, screws, horizontal turning plates

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
This place does not cover:
Machines or means for transplanting of plants or seedlings into the field, not into pots.
Planting of elongated parts of plants (like sugar cane buds).
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Transplanting seedlings or plants into pots

definition-item.definition-title: {Other parts or details or planting machines}

section-body.paragraph-text: Specific aspects of transplanting machines not covered in the other subgroups, like pivoting frames, wheels, furrowing tools, etc. are classified in this group. When appropriate, documents are additionally classified in A01C5/00 and in A01B.
This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Fertilisers or seeders with centrifugal wheels
Sand, gravel or salt spreaders for roads

section-body.paragraph-text: Control of the distribution rate, elements for pneumatic distribution of granular fertilizers, etc, are identical to the seed regulating or distributing means, and are additionally classified under A01C7/00, when appropriate.
This place covers:
Both this group and A01C15/007 cover also hoppers for seed.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
This place covers:
Only powder fertilizers, or specific aspects different or not suitable for seeds.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Aspects of the pneumatic distribution of granular fertilizer

definition-item.definition-title: with reciprocating pushers {or stirrers in front of the slots}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {with pushers or stirrers in front of the slits (with endless chains A01C15/18)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: with means for lifting out the fertiliser

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Fertilisers or seeders with centrifugal wheels

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Devices using the outward force of a spinning distributor to spread fertiliser or seed across a generally broad area of ground.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Mechanical throwing machines for articles or solid bulk materials, in general
Sand, gravel or salt spreaders for roads

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Dosing or regulation of the fertiliser or seed before reaching the rotating disks, i.e. dosing shutters and devices controlling the quantity and location of fertiliser or seed falling onto the rotating disks.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: {Devices controlling the quantity or the distribution pattern}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Regulation of the fertiliser or seed on or after the rotating disks, i.e. blades, chutes, plates for directing the flux of fertiliser or seed to the ground in a particular quantity or pattern.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group.

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements for driving working parts of fertilisers or seeders {(A01C17/005 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:
Also when the driving depends on the forward speed of the machine in general, even if this is not derived from a ground engaging wheel.

definition-item.definition-title: Methods of fertilising {, sowing or planting}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Special methods for fertilizing or sowing (like planting patterns or designs), as well as the methods for calculating fertilization requirements.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Distributing devices specially adapted for liquid manure or other fertilising liquid, including ammonia, e.g. transport tanks or sprinkling wagons

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Spraying or applying liquids or other fluent materials in general

definition-item.definition-title: {Distribution of liquid fertilisers by gravity flow}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Distribution of liquid ammonia in or on the soil
Distribution of liquid fertilisers under pressure

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for making drill or furrows

definition-item.definition-title: {Other methods for delivering fertiliser into the soil}

Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Filling devices for liquid manure or slurry tanks}

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangements for connecting hoses of the quick-acting type

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: W watering gardens, fields, sports grounds or the like
